channel.title: Posts on Ahmed Elsayes
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ahmed Elsayes

item.title: Using Both R and Python
item.description: So, thankfully I have been accepted to medical school pretty recently and I am very excited about that. I think that the more languages I can use the better, so learning R and Python this semester could potentially help in the medical field and any field. I opened the acceptance email with my dad in the car who is already a physician and we both screamed in excitement. He started being silly and talking about how I will be his prodigy, but I told him I do not want to be a radiologist like him.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
